GSP30parmartu:0: paraṃ parasthaṃ gahanād anādim ekaṃ niviṣṭaṃ bahudhā guhāsu |
GSP30parmartu:1: sarvālayaṃ sarvacarācarasthaṃ tvām eva śambhuṃ śaraṇaṃ prapadye || 1
GSP30parmartu:4: ādhārakārikābhiḥ taṃ gurur abhibhāṣati sma tatsāram |
GSP30parmartu:7: śaktir māyā prakṛtiḥ pṛthvī ceti prabhāvitaṃ prabhuṇā || 4 ||
GSP30parmartu:9: bhoktā ca tatra dehī śiva eva gṛhītapaśubhāvaḥ || 5 ||
GSP30parmartu:12: gacchati gacchati jala iva himakarabimbaṃ sthite sthitiṃ yāti |
GSP30parmartu:14: rāhur adṛśyo 'pi yathā śaśibimbasthaḥ prakāśate tadvat |
GSP30parmartu:16: ādarśe malarahite yadvad vadanaṃ vibhāti tadvad ayam |
GSP30parmartu:21: yat paratattvaṃ tasmin vibhāti ṣaṭṭriṃśadātma jagat || 11 ||
GSP30parmartu:23: bhāti vibhāgenaiva ca parasparaṃ darpaṇād api ca || 12 ||
GSP30parmartu:25: anyonyaṃ ca tato 'pi ca vibhaktam ābhāti jagad etat || 13 ||
GSP30parmartu:30: māyāparigrahavaśād bodho malinaḥ pumān paśur bhavati |
GSP30parmartu:32: adhunaiva kiṃcid evedam eva sarvātmanaiva jānāmi |
GSP30parmartu:33: māyāsahitaṃ kañcukaṣaṭkam aṇor antaraṅgam idam uktam || 17 ||
GSP30parmartu:34: kambukam iva ta.ṅdulakaṇaviniviṣṭaṃ bhinnam apy abhidā |
GSP30parmartu:40: eṣāṃ grāhyo viṣayaḥ sūkṣmaḥ pravibhāgavarjito yaḥ syāt |
GSP30parmartu:41: tanmātrapañcakaṃ tat śabdaḥ sparśo maho raso gandhaḥ || 21 ||
GSP30parmartu:43: abhyeti nabhaḥ pavanas tejaḥ salilaṃ ca pṛthvī ca || 22 ||
GSP30parmartu:44: tuṣa iva ta.ṅdulakaṇikām āvṛṇute prakṛtipūrvakaḥ sargaḥ |
GSP30parmartu:46: param āvaraṇaṃ mala iha sūkṣmaṃ māyādikañcukaṃ sthūlam |
GSP30parmartu:48: ajñānatimirayogād ekam api svaṃ svabhāvam ātmānam |
GSP30parmartu:51: tadvad avasthā bhedāḥ sarve paramātmanaḥ śambhoḥ || 26 ||
GSP30parmartu:53: vyavahāramātram etat paramārthena tu na santy eva || 27 ||
GSP30parmartu:54: rajjvāṃ nāsti bhujaṅgas trāsaṃ kurute ca mṛtyuparyantam |
GSP30parmartu:55: bhrānter mahatī śaktir na vivektuṃ śakyate nāma || 28 ||
GSP30parmartu:57: varṇāśramādi cātmany asad api vibhramabalād bhavati || 29 ||
GSP30parmartu:58: etat tad andhakāraṃ yad bhāveṣu prakāśamānatayā |
GSP30parmartu:60: timirād api timiram idaṃ ga.ṅdasyopari mahān ayaṃ sphoṭaḥ |
GSP30parmartu:63: ātmānam veṣṭayate citraṃ jālena jālakāra iva || 32 ||
GSP30parmartu:67: bhānti turīye dhāmani tathāpi tair nāvṛtaṃ bhāti || 34 ||
GSP30parmartu:68: jāgrad viśvaṃ bhedāt svapnas tejaḥ prakāśamāhātmyāt |
GSP30parmartu:69: prājñaḥ suptāvasthā jñānaghanatvāt tataḥ paraṃ turyam || 35 ||
GSP30parmartu:72: ekasmin ghaṭagagane rajasā vyāpte bhavanti nānyāni |
GSP30parmartu:74: śānte śānta ivāyaṃ hṛṣṭe hṛṣṭo vimohavati mūḍhaḥ |
GSP30parmartu:75: tattvagaṇe sati bhagavān na punaḥ paramārthataḥ sa tathā || 38 ||
GSP30parmartu:76: yad anātmany api tadrūpāvabhāsanaṃ tat purā nirākṛtya |
GSP30parmartu:80: pṛthivī prakṛtir māyā tritayam idaṃ vedyarūpatāpatitam |
GSP30parmartu:84: tad brahma paraṃ śuddhaṃ śāntaṃ abhedātmakaṃ samaṃ sakalam |
GSP30parmartu:86: iṣyata iti vedyata iti saṃpādyata iti ca bhāsvarūpeṇa |
GSP30parmartu:87: aparāmṛṣṭaṃ yad api tu nabhaḥprasūnatvam abhyeti || 44 ||
GSP30parmartu:90: punar api ca pañcaśaktiprasaraṇakrameṇa bahir api tat |
GSP30parmartu:94: mayy eva bhāti viśvaṃ darpaṇa iva nirmale ghatādīni |
GSP30parmartu:95: mattaḥ prasarati sarvaṃ svapnavicitratvam iva suptāt || 48 ||
GSP30parmartu:96: aham eva viśvarūpaḥ karacaranādisvabhāva iva dehaḥ |
GSP30parmartu:97: sarvasmin aham eva sphurāmi bhāveṣu bhāsvarūpam iva || 49 ||
GSP30parmartu:100: itthaṃ dvaitavikalpe galite pravilaṅghya mohinīṃ māyām |
GSP30parmartu:101: salile salilaṃ kṣīre kṣīram iva brahmaṇi layī syāt || 51 ||
GSP30parmartu:103: kaḥ śokaḥ ko mohaḥ sarvaṃ brahmāvalokayataḥ || 52 ||
GSP30parmartu:104: karmaphalaṃ śubham aśubhaṃ mithyājñānena saṃgamād eva |
GSP30parmartu:110: jñānaprāptau kṛtam api na phalāya tato 'sya janma katham |
GSP30parmartu:114: ātmajño na kutaścana bibheti sarvaṃ hi tasya nijarūpam |
GSP30parmartu:115: naiva ca śocati yasmāt paramārthe nāśitā nāsti || 58 ||
GSP30parmartu:117: aham eveti maheśvarabhāve kā durgatiḥ kasya || 59 ||
GSP30parmartu:118: mokṣasya naiva kiṃcid dhāmāsti na cāpi gamanam anyatra |
GSP30parmartu:123: jñānāgnidagdham evaṃ karma na janmapradaṃ bhavati || 62 ||
GSP30parmartu:131: katham iva saṃsārī syād vitatasya kutaḥ kva vā saraṇam || 66 ||
GSP30parmartu:132: iti yuktibhir api siddhaṃ yatkarma jñānino na saphalaṃ tat |
GSP30parmartu:133: na mamedam api tu tasyeti dārḍhyato na hi phalaṃ loke || 67 ||
GSP30parmartu:136: aśnan yad vā tad vā saṃvīto yena kenacic chāntaḥ |
GSP30parmartu:139: paramārthavin na puṇyair na ca pāpaiḥ spṛśyate vimalaḥ || 70 ||
GSP30parmartu:144: stutyaṃ vā hotavyaṃ nāsti vyatiriktam asya kiṃcana ca |
GSP30parmartu:145: stotrādinā sa tuṣyen muktas tan nirnamaskṛtivaṣaṭkaḥ || 73 ||
GSP30parmartu:147: nijam anyad atha śarīraṃ ghaṭādi vā tasya devagṛham || 74 ||
GSP30parmartu:152: dhyānam anastamitaṃ punar eṣa hi bhagavān vicitrarūpāṇi |
GSP30parmartu:155: antarbodhe parivartayati ca yat so 'sya japa uditaḥ || 78 ||
GSP30parmartu:156: sarvaṃ samayā dṛṣṭyā yat paśyati yac ca saṃvidaṃ manute |
GSP30parmartu:159: rasayati ca yat tad etad vratam asya sudurlabhaṃ ca sulabhaṃ ca || 80 ||
GSP30parmartu:163: nirupamaparamānandaṃ yo vetti sa tanmayo bhavati || 82 ||
GSP30parmartu:164: tīrthe śvapacagṛhe vā naṣṭasmṛtir api parityajan deham |
GSP30parmartu:177: prāptaḥ sa eva pūrvaṃ svargaṃ narakaṃ manuṣyatvam || 89 ||
GSP30parmartu:178: antyaḥ kṣaṇas tu tasmin puṇyāṃ pāpāṃ ca vā sthitiṃ puṣyan |
GSP30parmartu:179: mūḍhānāṃ sahakārībhāvaṃ gacchati gatau tu na sa hetuḥ || 90 ||
GSP30parmartu:182: svargamayo nirayamayas tad ayaṃ dehāntarālagaḥ puruṣaḥ |
GSP30parmartu:184: evaṃ jñānāvasare svātmā sakṛd asya yādṛg avabhātaḥ |
GSP30parmartu:185: tādṛśa eva tadāsau na dehapāte 'nyathā bhavati || 93 ||
GSP30parmartu:188: sa kathaṃ vigrahayoge sati na bhavet tena mohayoge 'pi |
GSP30parmartu:190: paramārthamārgam enaṃ jhaṭiti yadā gurumukhāt samabhyeti |
GSP30parmartu:194: tasya tu paramārthamayīṃ dhārām agatasya madhyaviśrānteḥ |
GSP30parmartu:198: paramārthamārgam enaṃ hy abhyasyāprāpya yogam api nāma |
GSP30parmartu:200: viṣayeṣu sārvabhaumaḥ sarvajanaiḥ pūjyate yathā rājā |
GSP30parmartu:202: mahatā kālena punar mānuṣyaṃ prāpya yogam abhyasya |
GSP30parmartu:203: prāpnoti divyam amṛtam yasmād āvartate na punaḥ || 102 ||
GSP30parmartu:204: tasmāt sanmārge 'smin nirato yaḥ kaścid eti sa śivatvam |
GSP30parmartu:205: iti matvā paramārthe yathā tathāpi prayatanīyam || 103 ||
GSP30parmartu:208: āryāśatena tad idaṃ saṃkṣiptaṃ śāstrasāram atigūḍham |
